title: Dogma
description: You can store these avi files on your pc for quick viewing.  I highly recommend using either Nero for burning these data files onto dvd for backup.  I also recommend using either Nero 7 and up for image conversion-burning, or using Ultra ISO (there&#039;s a trial version) for ISO conversion and burning.  I highly recommend installing the K_Lite free full codec pack to view avi&#039;s not covered by divx (www.xvid.com)
